summary: A message log or call sheet for Jeffrey Epstein dated April 11, 2005, detailing calls, messages, and tasks. It shows Epstein's daily operations involving staff, business contacts, personal arrangements, and high-profile connections, including a message from Naomi Campbell and a call regarding a political event with President Bush.

persons.context: The central figure for whom all messages and calls are logged; appears to be managing various personal, business, and staff matters.

connections.description: Cecilia acts as Epstein's assistant, managing his calls, messages, and logistical tasks.
Campbell seeks to discuss her swimsuit line and a meeting with Victoria's Secret with Epstein.
Connection indicated via a call from Reynolds' staff regarding an annual dinner with President Bush.
Eric handles financial transactions (wiring money, managing payments) and administrative tasks for Epstein.
Goldsmith is involved in sending legal letters on Epstein's behalf.
Reenstra provides photos and updates on properties, indicating involvement in Epstein's real estate or design matters.
Hersch notifies Epstein about an investment fund deadline, indicating financial advisory or investment relations.

events.title: Daily Message Log
events.description: A log of calls, messages, and tasks for Jeffrey Epstein, showing coordination of travel, property matters, financial transactions, and communications with high-profile individuals.

events.title: NRCC Annual Dinner with President Bush
events.description: Congressman Tom Reynolds' staff contacts Epstein regarding the June 14th annual dinner with President Bush, indicating Epstein's political connections.

events.title: Power Symposium Planning
events.description: Planning for a power symposium scheduled over four days between January 6 and January 17 or 18, 2006, with a $20,000 hotel deposit at risk.

events.title: Emerging Market Fund Deadline
events.description: Deadline for subscription to the Emerging Market Special Opportunities fund for May 1 trading, communicated to Epstein.

keyFacts: Naomi Campbell directly messaged Jeffrey Epstein seeking to discuss her swimsuit line and a potential meeting with Victoria's Secret.
Epstein was contacted by staff for Congressman Tom Reynolds regarding an annual dinner with President George W. Bush on June 14, indicating political access.
The log shows Epstein's staff managing complex logistics including private jet travel (JetBlue), helicopter transport, property renovations, and art purchases.
Financial activities noted include a $3 million wire transfer, stock trading, a $25,000 quarterly payment to a Dr. Landon, and investment fund deadlines.
The document reveals Epstein's use of multiple staff members (Cecilia, Eric, Manu) for daily operations and his connections to various professionals in real estate, law, medicine, and finance.
